Truancy is any intentional unauthorized or illegal absence from compulsory 
education. It is absences caused by students of their own free will, and usually 
does not refer to legitimate "excused" absences, such as ones related to medical 
conditions. Truancy is usually explicitly defined in the school's handbook of 
policies and ... Another term for truancy is playing hooky.
